User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the TeaMaps application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile photo.

reputationScore.description: The reputation score of the user, used for trust and verification.

Incident.title: Incident
Incident.description: Represents an incident reported in the TeaMaps application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Incident entity.

userId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N Incident) The user who reported the incident.

incidentType.description: Type of incident (e.g., Fire, Accident, Medical).

photoURL.description: URL of the photo/video evidence for the incident.

severity.description: Severity level of the incident (Critical, Warning, Info, Unverified).

status.description: Verification status of the incident (Unverified, Verifying, Verified).

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the incident was reported.

Verification.title: Verification
Verification.description: Represents a user's verification of an incident.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Verification entity.

userId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N Verification) The user who is verifying the incident.

incidentId.description: Reference to Incident. (Relationship: Incident 1:N Verification) The incident being verified.

verificationStatus.description: The user's verification status (Confirm, Can't Verify, Report as False).

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the verification was submitted.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Uses path-based ownership for private user data.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores all incidents reported by users. Publicly readable.

params.name: incidentId
params.description: The unique identifier of the incident.

definition.description: Stores user verifications for incidents. Users can only add verifications.

params.name: incidentId
params.description: The unique identifier of the incident.

params.name: verificationId
params.description: The unique identifier of the verification.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is updated to support public incident reporting. The `/incidents` collection is publicly readable to allow all users to see nearby alerts. User data remains private under `/users/{userId}`. Incident creation is allowed for any authenticated user. Verifications are stored under each incident, allowing users to contribute.
